name: The Dungeon of Trovas
description:
Oh no! The evil wizard has bestowed our brave hero with a mighty curse that forces him to move once or even more into another direction he did not intended to go. Will he be able to go through the dungeon and reach the bottom without dying?

There are 10 Levels: 

  • 1-3    : Movement and Item Introduction
  • 4-6    : Joined Keys Introduction
  • 7-10 : Advanced Puzzles

How are the keys Joined?

After the 3rd level you will be able to see the joined Keys in the bottom right corner.
If you press the most left key, then the keys to its right will be sequentially pressed.
If there's a looping arrow, both keys are joined together and pressing either will also press the other.

This game has been made by Neoministein and Siliwan in the GMTK 2021 Jam and has been a new experience for the both of us. We hope, you will enjoy our game.
